CUE: “My darling daughter, you’ve come back to me...”
“I’ve never met your daughter, but something tells me she’s not blue. Do you remember how you got here? Do you remember anything?"

"I don't remember teaching you to interrupt.% My little angel, you just got home. Your absence was already such a strain on my nerves... you wouldn’t want to hurt your poor mother anymore, would you? What kind of terrible child would do that?% You’ve missed so many lessons in your absence.  Besides, you came just in time for your piano lesson. Play, my seraph! Show me your perfection!”
“Is...is this what you really think of me?... When did my little angel become such a monster?

“That doesn’t make any sense. My daughter is just awful at the piano! I guess you really are not my daughter….% Pity, I thought for once we could be the perfect mother-daughter team. Though, that’s quite a ridiculous thought, it’s probably too much for a girl her age.% You’re out here worried about the state of the world, I couldn’t grasp what she has to worry about. I’ll let you slip by darling, I have my own thinking to do.”
“You kept up quite well this time, how peculiar…”
“Oh, darling, you’ve played so beautifully…”
“That lady messed with our heads…”
“Mama’s gonna get mad if you keep her waiting any longer…”
“Are you home, miss? She’s been worried sick looking for you.”
“The woman who came to be in charge of this place has been looking for her daughter for a long time now.”
“The doll head opens its eyes and looks at me. I jump and nearly drop the head.”
“Well. Still not the weirdest thing I’ve seen all day.”
“So I guess you can communicate.”
“I am really not feeling this living doll thing.”
"Here's your head back. You should probably dust it off first."
“You know, I thought being a disembodied head would be a nice change of pace. It isn’t. I guess I should thank you for bringing my head back. It’s nicer to not worry about being a living kickball.”
"The doll, seeming to notice your presence, gestures vaguely to the void above its shoulders"
"Dolly gives you a tumbs up. Cute."
"She gestures to her lack of a head adamantly, seeming to be disappointed with you."
